recipes: The city is rife with journalists and detectives and other meddlers. How long will they leave me in peace?
An adversary is asking searching questions about my activities.
We are all the sum of our deeds; that is the basis for any accounting.
I am safe, for now. My adversary has not enough evidence to bring a case against me, and they've found no new clues.
This hunter is putting the finishing touches to their investigation.
If this ever reaches trial, I will be in serious danger. Even if this hunter is disposed of, another may find their notes.
Rumour squats on rooftops and flutters in gutters. This hunter is making progress in their investigation.
I am certain that my adversary has lodged a copy of their notes elsewhere - with their solicitor, with their superior, or even with a contact in the press. This is troubling.
The wrong kind of reputation might awaken the interest of the curious, the puritanical, or the vengeful. [A Reputation may inspire an adversary to emerge.]
My name, just now, is clear. Any guardians remain in the shadows.
There's always someone who doesn't understand, or who understands too well. This troublemaker may seek evidence on my activities to share with the authorities.
My adversary has convinced the Suppression Bureau to consider my case. The Bureau is charged with punishment of the less usual type of criminal - the criminal whose crimes may exist only in dreams.
inv end - won't display, loops straight to trial. I should prepare myself.
I am to be tried in court!
The Suppression Bureau has taken ne in for questioning.
The Suppression Bureau is seeking a follower of mine for questioning. If they can't find one, they'll come after me directly.
The Suppression Bureau intends to try me in court!

There are crimes the state does not openly recognise. I am accused of one of these. The Suppression Bureau holds their trials in closed court, and they are not merciful. Unless I can take advantage of a connection, I risk imprisonment!

There are crimes the state does not openly recognise. My follower has been implicated in one of these. The Suppression Bureau holds their trials in closed court, and they are not merciful. Unless I can take advantage of a connection, I may lose the follower forever!
FNORD follower arrested end. The Bureau's appetite is satisfied for the moment; but what did my follower tell them?
FNORD follower exonerated setback. The Bureau has been stymied for the moment; but what did they learn from my follower?

There are crimes the state does not openly recognise. I am accused of one of these. The Suppression Bureau holds their trials in closed court, and they are not merciful. I must find a scapegoat, or all is lost.
